billEvents.eventText: referred to alcoholism and drug abuse

title: Prohibits the sale and purchase of urine with the intent to defraud drug screening tests
summary: Prohibits the sale and purchase of urine with the intent to defraud drug screening tests; further provides penalties for violations under this section.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the sale and purchase of urine with the intent to defraud drug screening tests
